issue.title: Simple, single robot submission Docker file

content.raw:
Paul - that’s what we tried for the tunnel circuit final, building the docker from the local catkin workspace. We didn’t have enough time to test and make it work and eventually our program didn’t work when they ran it.

That’s why our first task for the urban circuit was to make sure our Docker submission works, and for that we started with their sample solution docker, after which we copied our code and installed required libraries. Not being very experienced with Docker, this was much easier.
content.html:
Paul - that’s what we tried for the tunnel circuit final, building the docker from the local catkin workspace. We didn’t have enough time to test and make it work and eventually our program didn’t work when they ran it.

That’s why our first task for the urban circuit was to make sure our Docker submission works, and for that we started with their sample solution docker, after which we copied our code and installed required libraries. Not being very experienced with Docker, this was much easier.
